options.name: Stalk
options.description: Gain +1 Stealth. You Movement Speed while Hidden is no longer reduced.

options.name: Kleptomania
options.description: Gain +1 Thievery. You gain benefits from stealing Objects. When you steal an Object, you gain 1 Temporary Health after your next Full Rest for each 20 Gold of value on the Object up to a maximum of your Level. For each successive Full Rest, you gain 1 Less Temporary Health until you the value becomes 0 or you Steal another Object.

options.name: Free Action : Pocket Sand
options.description: You toss either debris from your pocket or dirt from the ground at a Creature within 2 Units by making a Contested Thievery Check against their Initiative. On a success, the Creature is Blinded until the end of your turn and cannot take Reactions unless they have another sense to locate you by such as Echolocation or Tremorsense.

options.name: Free Action : Quick Hide
options.description: When you use an Action to Move, you can also Hide as part of that Action if no Enemy Creatures have Line of Sight on you.

options.name: Action : Cunning Strike
options.description: You make a Weapon Attack against a Creature who has at least 1 of your Allies Adjacent to them dealing an extra 1d12 Damage. You Target must make a Concentration Check against Half the Damage after Migitation or you are considered Hidden against them until the Start of your next turn.
